LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperWeakestImmunity.label: super weakest immunity
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperWeakestImmunity.descripti: Just so long as I don't catch any infection or contamination.
LanguageData.XMonsters_WeakestImmunity.label: weakest immunity
LanguageData.XMonsters_WeakestImmunity.description: It will be very difficult to live with such immunity.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryWeakImmunity.label: very weak immunity
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryWeakImmunity.description: It will be difficult to live with such immunity.
LanguageData.XMonsters_StrongImmunity.label: free strong immunity
LanguageData.XMonsters_StrongImmunity.description: A free analogue of the existing <color=#66c6cc>vanilla gene</color>, which also surpasses it to some extent.
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperImmunity.label: cheap super immunity
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperImmunity.description: A cheap analogue of the existing <color=#66c6cc>vanilla gene</color>.
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperStrongImmunity.label: super strong immunity
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperStrongImmunity.descriptio: Immunity with which you are ALMOST not afraid of any disease.
LanguageData.XMonsters_PerfectImmunity.label: non-archite perfect immunity
